name: MyNeato
0:
”Alexa, ask MyNeato to start cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask MyNeato to stop cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask MyNeato where is my robot.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my neato
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Keeping your home clean just got easier and smarter. Get voice-activated, vacuuming on-demand with the MyNeato skill for Amazon Alexa for Neato’s D10, D9, D8 robot vacuums.
 
Neato’s thoughtfully designed robot vacuums use LaserSmart technology to map and navigate your home, choosing the best, most methodical path to vacuum your floors. Each Neato is equipped with industry-leading suction power, floor coverage, a first-of-its-kind D-shape that enables it to clean deep into corners and closely along edges—something round robots cannot—and much more to fit your personal cleaning needs.
 
To get started with the MyNeato skill for Amazon Alexa voice commands, select the 'Enable Skill' button above to link your MyNeato account and your Neato D10, D9, or D8 robot vacuum. Make sure your robot has the latest firmware installed.
 
After connecting Alexa to your Neato, simply say “Alexa, ask MyNeato…”
“…to start cleaning.”
“…to stop cleaning.”
“…to resume cleaning.”
“…to go back to base.”
“…where is my robot.”
“…to clean he kitchen.”*
 
The MyNeato skill for Amazon Alexa is compatible with the following Neato intelligent robot vacuums: D10, D9, and D8. *Zone cleaning requires robot model D9 or D10.
 
Need help or have questions? Contact Neato’s Customer Care team at: https://NeatoRobotics.com/Customer-Care/
